meta.title: Credits
meta.description: Meet the amazing people who support Tabber's development

title: Thank You to Our Supporters
description: This page honors those who help make Tabber possible through their Patreon subscriptions and other contributions.
subtitle: Your subscription doesn't just give you access to premium features â€” it directly fuels development of Tabber for everyone. From bug fixes to new capabilities, your support makes a difference.

questions.question: How do I get my name on this page?
questions.answer: Your name will be added to our Credits page within 48 hours of subscribing through Patreon.

questions.question: Can I remain anonymous?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Just let us know in your Patreon message that you prefer to remain anonymous.

questions.question: How long will my name appear here?
questions.answer: Your name will be displayed as long as your subscription is active.

questions.question: Can I customize how my name appears?
questions.answer: Yes! Let us know in your Patreon message how you'd like your name and picture to appear.
